name: Example
short_desc: A short phrase that simply states what the code does, nothing else.
long_desc: An introduction to the software and the most important data a new user must know. This should be less information than the user guide, but may use content from the user guide.
user_guide_desc: Read step-by-step instructions on getting started and a detailed breakdown of version differences in the User Guide.
